title: Amend a Sales Order
description: A customer wants to increase the quantity of an item on an order that has not yet entered production.

tasks.description: Find the sales order and verify it is not yet in production.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the order and confirms its status allows for changes.

tasks.description: Update the quantity for the line item as requested by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent changes the quantity on the sales order line.

tasks.description: Send a revised order acknowledgement to the customer with the new total.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the updated confirmation to the customer.
